Literature.Title: Isolation, purification, and detection of the antimicrobial activity of the antimicrobial peptide CcAMP1 from Coridius chinensis (Hemiptera: Dinidoridae)
Literature.Author: Li S, Zhao B, Du J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12.5µM),Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MIC=6.26µM),Micrococcus luteus CMCC 28001(MIC=12.5µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=6.26µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.26µM),Ralstonia solanacearum ATCC 33192(MIC=6.26µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi CMCC 50071(MIC=3.13µM),Shigella dysenteriae CMCC 51252(MIC=1.57µM)
